content: is there such a thing as  \"Caution: Contents May Be Hot\" t-shirt (cf existing ones)?

Yes, there are t-shirts that feature the phrase "Caution: Contents May Be Hot" or similar variations. These t-shirts often include a graphic or text referencing hot coffee or hot beverages as a humorous or ironic statement. They are typically designed as a reference to warning labels seen on coffee cups or fast food containers. You can find such t-shirts in various online stores, clothing retailers, or specialty shops that sell novelty or funny t-shirts.
